author: cathkoru
title: Excellent value-for-money option near St Pancras -
text: Good value for money conveniently located near St Pancras International (Eurostar). Nothing fancy if you agree to simple and basic, but clean and quiet, and lovely staff. London boroughs of easy access by foot (Bloomsbury) or bus/tube. Premier Inn definitely a good option if the UK.
